DyslexiAid is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help teenagers and adults with dyslexia read and comprehend online text with ease. Our intuitive extension empowers users by offering customizable font styles and soothing background colors to create an optimal reading environment.

Reading can be a challenge for those with dyslexia. However, recent research has shown that specific font types and background colors can significantly improve reading speed, accuracy, and comprehension for dyslexic individuals. DyslexiAid incorporates these findings, offering font options like Open Dyslexic and Comic Sans MS, which are easier to read for people with dyslexia.

Studies suggest that using colored overlays, like yellow or blue-green, can enhance text readability. DyslexiAid allows users to choose their preferred background color, further catering to their individual needs and preferences.

Key features of DyslexiAid include:

Research-backed font styles, such as Open Dyslexic and Comic Sans MS
Customizable background colors for improved readability
Easy-to-use interface, suitable for teenagers and adults alike
Seamless integration with popular websites for a comfortable reading experience
With DyslexiAid, you can transform your online reading journey and discover the joy of reading with confidence. Join thousands of satisfied users who have benefited from our dyslexia-friendly Chrome extension
